query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN displayName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN preferredName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN phone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN bio VARCHAR(160),
ADD COLUMN photoUrl VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN photoUrlSmall VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN staffId VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN locationIds TEXT;
